roles.name: Citizen
roles.description: Citizen who can raise complaint

roles.name: Employee
roles.description: Default role for all employees

roles.name: Super User
roles.description: System Administrator. Can change all master data and has access to all the system screens.

roles.name: TL Counter Employee
roles.description: Counter Employee in Trade License who files TL on behalf of the citizen

roles.name: TL Approver
roles.description: Approver who verifies and approves the TL application

roles.name: Sanitary Section Inspector
roles.description: Sanitary Section Inspector

roles.name: Engg. Section Inspector
roles.description: Engg. Section Inspector

roles.name: Universal Collection Employee
roles.description: Universal Miscellaneous Collection Employee

roles.name: System user
roles.description: System user role

roles.name: DGDE user
roles.description: DGDE user role

roles.name: Customer Support Representative
roles.description: Employee who files and follows up complaints on behalf of the citizen

roles.name: Grievance Routing Officer
roles.description: Grievance Routing Officer

roles.name: Redressal Officer
roles.description: Employees that address citizens grievances.

roles.name: ANONYMOUS
roles.description: ANONYMOUS user for action which does not require login

roles.name: State Administrator
roles.description: Admin role that as access over a state

roles.name: LR Counter Employee
roles.description: LR Counter Employee can approve the Lease Renewal Application
